text: (Nkͻnkͻnsafoͻ no) bεfrε (agyidiefoͻ no) sε: “Na yεnnka mo ho (wͻ wiase)?“ (Agyidiefoͻ no) bεka sε: “Aane, nanso modaadaa moho, εna motwεnee (sε ebia agyidiefoͻ no bedi nkoguo), na moadwen ansi mo pi, na apεdeε hunu daadaa mo kͻpem sε Nyankopͻn ahyεdeε no baeε, na (ͻbonsam) daadaafoͻ no daadaa mo wͻ Nyankopͻn ho “
